premiumIntro.headline:
Spa-standard care
at your place.
premiumIntro.description: Experience premium at-home massage in Ho Chi Minh City. Our certified therapists bring the same quality and care you expect from a top spa — with total discretion and convenience.

body.name: Body Massage
body.description: Relieve pain and boost blood circulation throughout the body
body.details: Deep full-body massage techniques to release muscle tension, reduce pain and improve circulation. Certified therapists come to your location with all equipment and premium natural oils.

neck.name: Shoulder & Neck Massage
neck.description: Relieve muscle tension in neck and shoulders from prolonged desk work
neck.details: Deep massage focused on the neck, shoulder and upper back area to release muscle knots from long hours at a computer. Helps improve posture, reduce headaches and restore flexibility.

shiatsu.name: Japanese Shiatsu
shiatsu.description: Acupressure to unblock energy flow and restore the body
shiatsu.details: Traditional Japanese Shiatsu acupressure targets specific pressure points on the body to unblock energy flow, reduce chronic fatigue and strengthen the body's natural immunity.

swedish.name: Swedish Massage
swedish.description: Improve sleep quality, balance the mind and achieve total relaxation
swedish.details: Swedish massage uses gentle, rhythmic strokes to deeply relax the nervous system, improve sleep quality and bring a wonderful sense of mental balance and well-being.

q1.question: Which areas in Ho Chi Minh City do you serve?
q1.answer: We serve all districts in Ho Chi Minh City and surrounding areas. Please message us on Zalo to confirm your specific address.

q2.question: What are your service hours?
q2.answer: We serve from 8:00 AM - 11:30 PM daily, including weekends and holidays.

q3.question: Can I reschedule or cancel?
q3.answer: Yes, you can reschedule or cancel by contacting us via Zalo or hotline at least 2 hours in advance.

q4.question: What do I need to prepare at home?
q4.answer: Just be home and have a comfortable space to lie down. Our therapist will bring all tools, oils and towels needed.

q5.question: What is your privacy policy?
q5.answer: We are fully committed to protecting customer information and will never share it with third parties.
